detailsOfAchievement: 1. Started Monastic School with Academic Subjects are being taught to more than 130 Students. 2.With the financial support from the Ministry of Culture, Govt of India the society has started Computer Training Centre, where students are taught both basic and and advance usage of computer knowledge and its advantages in day to day life activities. 3. Promoted various social welfare programs in Tawang Dist and West Kameng Dist of Arunachal Pradesh 4. Renovated and repaired ancient monuments, Stupas, Monasteries in both districts of Tawang and West Kameng 5.Conducted Worksho for conservation and preservation of Environment Cleanliness and natural habitats. 6.Special course on Buddhist Philosophy conducted at various local monasteries and institutes. 7. 3 Months long Meditation retreats and camps were conducted at Khinmey Monastery. 8.More than 40 monks students participate in annual religious special puja held in Bodha Gaya, Bihar, India 9. Construction of 20 feet Medicine Buddha Statue is undertaken 10. Further, the society is celebrating various religious and national festivals like: (i) Buddha Poornima (ii)Birth Anniversary of Guru Padmasambhava (iii First Teaching day of Lord Buddha (iv)Saka Dawa (v)Independence Day (vi)Republic Day (vii)Teachers Day (viii)Gandhi Jayanti During these special occasions, thousands of people gather and celebrate. The Society is also engaged in various charitable programs and activities.
